column4: Hello, I am having a problem changing my MAC address on my Atheros wifi card.  When I change it with ifconfig, it shows that it has changed... however my card will ignore anything addressed to the spoofed MAC address.
I think my chipset restricts me from doing it, but I am trying to find a work-around solution for this.
you are doing it wrong. don't use ifconfig, use the madwifi tool to create a new VAP with the desired MAC adress
